title: Router: Data + Persistence (neutral)
description: Routes data/persistence intents to neutral packs.

content.mermaid:
flowchart TD
  Input[Data/persistence request] --> Kind{which?}
  Kind -->|baseline| B[pack.data.baseline.neutral.v1]
  Kind -->|choose storage| C[pack.data.choose_storage.neutral.v1]
  Kind -->|cache strategy| K[pack.data.cache.strategy.neutral.v1]
